data.name: Webcam World View
data.detailed_description:
Take an exciting journey around the world with hundreds of webcams showing views from all corners of our planet twenty-four hours a day, seven days a week. Cities and countries, oceans and land, space, flora, and fauna - feel all the greatness of the Earth!

This application is created for curious people who dream of new discoveries.
With our project, you can make a round-the-world trip without leaving home. No, we have not learned how to teleport yet. But we can create really cool collections of online cameras and timelapses from different locations and share the beauty of the world with our users in 24/7 mode.


  • Visit all corners of our planet: from the largest megacities to the mountain peaks.
  • Observe the life of animals, including rare animals, in the territories of Asia, America, Africa, and Europe.
  • Look at the Earth from space: the lights of night cities and endless blue oceans are waiting for you!
  • Watch hundreds of timelapses - short accelerated videos showing the life of wildlife and the stone jungle
  • Learn new facts about the world by reading descriptions for each camera. We tell you what is the selected broadcast remarkable for.

Discover how wonderful, diverse and infinitely beautiful this world can be - visit the most remote corners of our planet!

data.short_description: Take an exciting journey around the world with hundreds of webcams showing views from all corners of our planet twenty-four hours a day, seven days a week.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual-core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 320 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Capitan or more
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual-core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
